title: Calculating Bar Widths
text: The first step in calculating Bar Widths is to find the highest number (14) and the lowest number (9).
speech: The first step in calculating Bar Widths is to find the highest number (14) and the lowest number (9).
pacedSpeech: The first step in calculating Bar Widths is to find the highest number (14) and the lowest number (9).

title: Calculating Bar Widths
text: The final step is to divide (highest - lowest)/number of bars then round up which gives us $$\frac{14-9}{6}$$ $$=$$ $$.83$$ which rounds up to $$1$$.
speech: The final step is to divide (highest - lowest)/number of bars then round up which gives us  fraction, 14 minus 9, over 6,    is equal to,   .83  which rounds up to  1 .
